Camden.Beideman, Camden: Beideman is a neighborhood name in the East Camden section of the City of Camden, New Jersey, USA. According to the 2000 U.S. Census, Beideman has a population of 5,677. The neighborhood name Beideman originates from a prominent family that lived there, with several notable members including Benjamin C. Beideman and Horace B. Beideman. The name Beideman has been frequently misspelled as "Biedman" or "Biedeman".
